1. Uno kutwalaho lika kulinangula Mbimbiliya nachiminganyalisa ngachilihi?
Chakuzeneka kukakasana, evi vyuma vyavindende vyamuMbimbiliya tunahitulukamo vinazamisa zangi yenu hali Yehova. Ngocho twatela kutwalililaho lika nakuzamisa eyi zangi kana. (WaPetulu 1, 2:2) Lutalililo lwenu lwakuyoya haya myaka yosena lwapendamina hakutwalaho lika nakulinangula Mazu aKalunga nakupandama kuli ikiye.—Tangenu Yowano 17:3; WaYuta 21.
Omu chinyingi chenu chakutachikiza Kalunga chili nakuvula, nalufwelelo lwen
... (509 chars skipped) ... 
ila Mbimbiliya nakulumbununa lufwelelo lwenu muli Yehova namujimbu wamwaza.—Tangenu Wavaka-Loma 10:13, 14.
Vatu vavavulu veji kuputukanga kwazana mujimbu wamwaza namasepa javo chipwe vausoko wavo. Oloze mwatela kupwa vakuzangama hakulinga ngocho. Muchishishisa chakuvalweza ngwenu kwitava chavo chamakuli, valwezenu kaha vyuma ashika Kalunga. Anukenu nawa ngwenu vatu navevwa kuwaha chikuma hakumona vilinga vyenu vyalikoji keshi hakwivwa vyuma namuhanjika kahako.—Tangenu WaChimoteu 2, 2:24, 25.

 wakuwahilila. Munahase kupandama kuli ikiye hakupandama kwakamwihi navatu jenyi. (WavaHepeleu 10:24, 25) Nge namutwalaho lika nakwivwisa Yehova kuwaha, kaha namukatambula kuyoya chahaya myaka yosena. Kupandama kuli Kalunga hichuma chachilemu chize mwatela kulinga.—Tangenu WaChimoteu 1, 1:11; 6:19.
LINANGULE VIKWAVO
Lombenu Vaminangule Mbimbiliya Hawana Wakanyombo
Mbimbiliya yinakukumbulula vihula vyavilemu vyavatu vavavulu mukaye. Kutala nayenu namusaka mbimbiliya yikumbulule vihula vyenu tahi?

NUNGA NI KUSHISHIKA KULI YEHOVA!
2016 Kukunguluka cha Mambonge cha Yehova ja Yehova
Tunechi ukeze ku kukunguluka cha mambonge cha matangwa atatu chize Yela ja Yehova makapwa nacho.
YIKUMA YILEMU
● Liamatanu: Pande ni yinema muyikatulongesa chize Yesu Kristu ahichikile chilweza chipema chakupwa “musandu” wa Zambi.—Yilinga 2:27.
● Liaposo: Mutukamona chize mukanda wa Mbimbiliya wa Yombi wakutulongesa chize twatamba kununga ni ushishiko muze mutumona lamba linene.
● Liayenga: Mutukatala nawa chinema chipema chinji chize muchisolola chize Mwanangana Hezekia “walalaminyine kuli Yehova” muze amukwachile kuli akwa-kole jenyi.—2 Mianangana 18:6.
IYA MAKAPWAKO?
Mutu mweswawo. Kuchi kafweta nichimwe ha kunjila, nawa kechi kakwita mbongo.
Tala katalilo mweswe ni chinema cha kukunguluka chetu cha mambonge.

Nyi liji limwe lia kushinjila atu nuli nalio, ambenu.—Yili. 13:15.
Chikwo nawa, tunyongenu chize mutuhasa kukwasa akwetu muze mutwaakolweza. Koji yamba ngwenyi: “Napwile ni kulimona ngwe chishi ulemu. Ami napinjile ni manyonga wano ha miaka yinji. Alioze limwe tangwa, nayile ni kwambujola ni umwe mukulwana wa mu chikungulwila, aye yangumona ngwo te ngunanenganyana ha tangwa liacho. Aye kangupanjikile ni uhomboloji weswe muze te ngunamulweza yuma yize napwile nayo ku mbunge. Hachino, aye yangwiwu

Constantino kalingile chimwe kukunguluka ni mianangana a uwayilo, chize te akuvuluka ngwo Concílio de Nicéia. Muze ahwishile kukunguluka chacho, mwanangana yasa sasendote yoze te avuluka ngwo Ário mu zuwo lia ususu, mumu te kakulituna kutayiza ngwo Yesu mwe Zambi. Akwa-sango ja kushakulu kakwamba ngwo, ha mashimbu ja Mwanangana Te

stolo Paulu neye yalipikala ha “kukwasa yikungulwila yeswe.” (2 Kori. 11:28) Yika mba twatamba kulinga muze mutupwa ni yipikalo yize muyitunehena chinyengo? Tata yetu wa mu malilu kakwashile tuvumbi twenyi a kushakulu ahwime ku yipikalo yize apwile nayo, mba kanazange atukwase ni yetu nawa musono. Kuchi mutuhasa kulinga chocho? Kulemba, kutanga, kupukuna Liji lia Zambi, kwita spiritu yisandu ya Yehova hanga yitukwase, ni kuhanjika kuli yoze twafuliela hachize tunevu ku mbunge yetu. w16.12 3:1, 2

Kalunga eji kuhanjikanga nayetu kuhichila muMbimbiliya. WaChimoteu 2, 3:16
Kalunga wamuchano alwezele malunga vamwe vasoneke mazu enyi mumukanda umwe wajila. Mukanda kana vauvuluka ngwavo Mbimbiliya. MuMbimbiliya mwatwama mijimbu yayilemu yize Kalunga asaka mutachikize.
Kalunga atachikiza vyuma vyamwaza twasaka, kaha nawa ikiye eji kutuhananga mangana amwenemwene. Nge natumwivwilila, kaha natupwa chikupu namangana.—Vishimo 1:5.
Kalunga asaka vatu vosena hano hamavu vatangenga Mbimbiliya. Yili jino mumalimi amavulu.
Nge muli nakusaka kwivwilila kuli Kalunga, kaha mwatela kutanga Mbimbiliya nakuyivwishisa.
Vatu mukaye kosena vali nakwivwilila. Mateu 28:19
Vinjiho jaYehova vanahase kumikafwa mwivwishise kanawa Mbimbiliya.
Veji kunangulanga muchano waKalunga mukaye kosena.
Kaveshi kumifwetesa hakuminangulako. Munahase nawa kulinangula vyaKalunga haZuvo yaWangana yaVinjiho jaYehova mwalihata nayo.

Kalimbalimba wa yiyulo kakumulumbununa ngwo, kuzachisa chipi wata kuli akwa-kuyula hanga ayuke. Yitanga yacho yaputukile kulu. Chakutalilaho, Mbimbiliya yili ni shimbi yize yakanjisa kuliaha chijiko ha kusopa milonga, chekwamba ngwo yitanga ya kalimbalimba hi yalinga miaka 3,500. (Kutuhuka 23:8) Chochene, kalimbalimba hi kutambula chijiko wika ko. Akwa-kukalakala akalimbalimba ha mashimbu akwo kakumbata yuma yambala ni kulinga yimwe milimo yize kuyaatambile hanga atambule ko yuma hanji kwiya mbo
... (343 chars skipped) ... 
no uze ukwete kalimbalimba munji uli yizavu ya mafwefwe, policia, akwa-kukalakala mu unguvulu, akwa-kulinga shimbi ni ngaji. (2013 Barômetro Global da Corrupção) Tutalenu jimwe sango jinasolola yuma yacho.
AFRICA: Ha mwaka 2013, akwa-kukalakala ku nguvulu 22,000 mu Africa do Sul, kanakafwetesa mbongo ha mukunda wa yitanga ya kalimbalimba.
AMERICA: Ha mwaka 2012, mu Brazil miata 25 kanakasopesa ha mukunda wa kuzachisa mbongo ja nguvulu hanga atu asakule. Hali waze asopesele, umwe te muhato wa mwa
... (343 chars skipped) ...
Malmström, kambile ngwenyi: “Kalimbalimba kanoko chinji mu europa.” Iye yamba nawa ngwenyi: “Chinakaliwa chinji manguvulu kuhwisa yitanga ya kalimbalimba.”
Kalimbalimba wa unguvulu kali ni miji yikolo. Mutu walilongesa chinji, Suzana Rose-Ackeman, yoze wakuhengwojola yikuma ya kuhwisa kalimbalimba, yasoneka ngwenyi, kuhwisa kalimbalimba, “ndo kwalumuna chize unguvulu wakukalakala. Chipwe yitanga yacho muyisoloka ngwe yikalu chinji, alioze Mbimbiliya yinasolola ngwo yuma yinji muyikalumuka pundu.

UKALU
Ulo weji kufukilanga nge vapwevo nalunga navahanjikanga mazu akulisakwilila. Vaka-kulimbata vavavulu vanalitwamina kutala havilinga vyamwaza vyavaka-mahyavo nakuvalingisa jino vahone kupwa namuchima wakusakwilila. Mukanda vavuluka ngwavo Emotional Infidelity, muka-kukafwa vaka-kulimbata ambile ngwenyi, vaka-kulimbata vavavulu vaze vejilenga kuli ikiye, “kavahanjikilenga chikuma havyuma vize vyasolokelenga muuloko, oloze vahanjikilenga kaha haukalu weka. Omu vejilenga muofesi yami vangulwez
... (1455 chars skipped) ... 
lo wavo. Pwevo umwe walijina lyaValerie ambile ngwenyi: “Kachi nge mutu mwamona ngwenyi muka-mahyenyi kamusakwililako, kaha nahase kumulingisa apandame kuli mutu weka uze eji kumusakwililanga.”
VYUMA MWATELA KULINGA
Kekesenu vilinga vyamuka-mahyenu. Muchalumingo nachikavangizaho, fwilenu kukekesa kanawa vilinga vyamwaza eji kusololanga muka-mahyenu. Kaha nawa talenu havyuma eji kulinga muka-mahyenu hazuvo mangana mutwame kanawa, vize pamo mweji kulelesanga. Kuheta kusongo yachalumingo, sonekenu 
... (1455 chars skipped) ...
upwenga ngulunga wamwenemwene nakufwila nawa kukilikita chikuma muulo wetu.”—Lushimbi lwamuMbimbiliya: Wavaka-Kolose 4:6.
Vaka-kulimbata vaze veji kulisakwililanga veji kujikijisanga malo avo. Lunga umwe walijina lyaMichael ambile ngwenyi, “Nge vaze valimbata navatalanga kaha havyuma vyamwaza vize veji kulinganga vaka-mahyavo, kaha malo avo nawafukilanga. Kachi nge nakwepuka ukalu, kaha kaveshi kulahila kujiha uloko mwomwo vanatalenga havyuma vyamwaza veji kulinganga vaka-mahyavo shimbu yosena.”

Tweji kuyanga kukukunguluka chetu chavaka-Kulishitu lwola lwosena, numba tumona tuhu ukalu wakufwana ngachilihi mukuyoya chetu. Uno mwomwo ika Vinjiho jaYehova veji kufwilanga kupwa navandumbwavo kukukunguluka numba tuhu vali naukalu mukuyoya chavo chipwe vanazeye hakufuma kumilimo?
Kukunguluka cheji kutukafwanga. Paulu asonekele hali vaze tweji kulikatanga navo muchikungulwilo ngwenyi: “Tulihakenunga michima navakwetu.” (WavaHepeleu 10:24) Awa mazu alumbununa “kushinganyeka chikuma,” kulumbunun
... (134 chars skipped) ... 
itanga javandumbwetu vaka-Kulishitu, tweji kuwananga nge vamwe vanahonesanga ukalu ngana wayetu, kahechi cheji kutukafwanga nayetu tuhonese ukalu kana.
Cheji kutukafwanga tutunge usepa wakukola. Hakukunguluka chetu tweji kulikungulwilanga hamwe namasepa vamwenemwene. Lwola lumwe nalumwe nawa tweji kushikamanga navo hamwe nakulya nakunwa nakulivwisa kuwaha. Uno kulikata kana cheji kutunganyalisanga ngachilihi? Tweji kulinangulanga mwakulivumbikila umwe namukwavo, nakuzamisa zangi yetu. Kaha nge v
... (134 chars skipped) ...
navandumbwetu vosena vatwama muchikungulwilo, tweji kusololanga nge ‘twalizakama kanawa navakwetu.’—Wavaka-Kolinde 1, 12:25, 26.
Tuli nakumikolezeza mutunge usepa navaze veji kulinganga mwaya muchima waKalunga. Vatu kana munahase kuvawana hakachi kaVinjiho jaYehova. Tunamilombo ngwetu kanda kwechelela vyuma vimwe vimihonese kulikata nayetuko.
Mwomwo ika chapwila changanyo kulikata hamwe navakwetu hakukunguluka?
Lwola muka munashinganyeka kukeza kukukunguluka chetu mangana mukatutachikize kanawa?

YEHOVA KALUNGA hakusaka kutukafwa tumwijive Meshiya, ahwiminyinyine vapolofweto vavavulu vamuMbimbiliya vasoneke vyakusemuka, namulimo, nakufwa chayou Mulwilo vashikile. Upolofweto wosenou wamuMbimbiliya wateselemo muli Yesu Kulishitu. Upolofweto kana wapwa wakwoloka kaha nawa wakujiminyina. Hakusaka twivwishise kanawa, tukekese upolofweto uze wahanjikile chimweza vyakusemuka chaMeshiya nalwola lwaunyike wenyi.
Kapolofweto Isaya ahanjikile chimweza ngwenyi Meshiya mwakafuma kuchisaka chaMwangana
... (292 chars skipped) ... 
apwile jinganda jivali vavulukilenga ngwavo Mbetelema. Nganda imwe yapwilile kungalila yakunote kwakamwihi nanganda yaNazaleta, kaha yikwavo yapwilile kwakamwihi naYelusalema muYuta. Mbetelema yapwile kwakamwihi naYelusalema vayivulukilenga ngwavo Efwalata. Yesu asemukilile munganda vene eyi, ngana muze wavulukile upolofweto!—Mateu 2:1.
Upolofweto ukwavo wamuMbimbiliya wahanjikile chimweza ngwawo MwanaKalunga navakamusanyika ‘kufuma muEjipitu.’ Yesu vamutwalile kuEjipitu omu apwile kanyike. Kaha
... (292 chars skipped) ...
 evi navize vananoneka mwishi yamutwe wakwamba ngwavo “Kutesamo.” Kulinga ngocho nachizamisa lufwelelo lwove mumuchano wamuMazu aKalunga.
Omu naukekesa visoneka kanevi, ijiva ngwove upolofweto umwe vausonekele myaka yayivulu kunyima shimbu kanda Yesu asemuke. Yesu ambile ngwenyi: “Vyuma vyosenevi vasoneka kuJishimbi jaMose nakumikanda yavapolofweto nakuJisamu, vyuma vyakunguvulukAmi, ngwami, kuvanga visoloke.” (Luka 24:44) Upolofweto kana wateselemo chikupu, nganomu unalimwena muMbimbiliya yove!

Kuchi Yela ja Yehova akunyingika ngwo yiwanyino ya matangwa akunanga kuyalitele?
Muze kanda achikwata chiyulo cha kulinga hanji kuya ha chimwe chiwanyino cha matangwa a kunanga, Yela ja Yehova kakuhengwola shimbi ja mu Mbimbiliya jinatale ha chikuma chacho. Muze akumona ngwo, yiwanyino yimwe hanji matangwa akunanga kanalimiki ni shimbi ja mu Mbimbiliya, Yela ja Yehova keshi kulinga yiwanyino yacho. Hakutwala ku yiwanyino yimwe hanji matangwa a kunanga, Chela cha Yehova mweswe kakukwata chiyulo c
... (9391 chars skipped) ... 
u akufuliela. Alioze, twakwehuka yiwanyino yize yakuchinga mayingeleja ngwe:
Yiwanyino yize yakulemesa umwe ngana ya yingeleja hanji yize yakuchinga hamuwika mayingeleja alisa. Ku shakulu, muze Zambi atwalile A-Izalele ku chifuchi chize atu te akuwayila tuzambi akwo, iye yaalweza ngwenyi: “Kanda nukakolesa no usendo niumwe chipwe ni tuzambi two . . . Mumu nyi munulingila tuzambi two, chamwenemwene kumuchikapwa kambwila kuli yenu.” (Kutuhuka 23:32, 33) Kashika, Yela ja Yehova keshi kuya ha yiwany
... (9391 chars skipped) ...
o jo chipwe ngwe keshi kulinga yiwanyino ya matangwa?
Ewa. Mbimbiliya yakutulongesa ngwo atu katamba kuzanga ni kuvumbika asoko jo eswe chipwe ngwe uwayilo wo unalise. (1 Petulu 3:1, 2, 7) Muze umwe chela cha Yehova akwecha kupwa ha yiwanyino yimwe, amwe asoko jenyi mahasa kulivwa chipi. Kashika, Yela ja Yehova kakusa tachi hanga akwase asoko jo kupwa ni shindakenyo ngwo, kakwazanga chinji, ni kwalumbunwina mumu liaka o akwachile chiyulo cha kwehuka yiwanyino yimwe ni kwameneka ha mashimbu amwe.

Sierra Vista Fellowship, mu chihela hanji ndonda ya Tembele ya Branham, ku Jeffersonville Indiana, kuze ndumbu Yosefwe Branham ali kafunga; nyonga lio liahiana, lili lia kulianyina mikanda ni uwayilo mu malimi ni mtundu yeswe. Tunakilikita hamuwika ni kalayi wa Tembele ya Branham, nyi kachi munupwa nyi yimwe yihulo, hanji yimwe yilemu, vulie mwanyi, yihulenu kuli kalayi, ndumbu Jeremiya Evans ku [email protected].
Ayino molimo yeswe, yili kwayo ya kulihana chitapo,kuyishi nyi fweto, nawa kuyechile mbongo chipwe kuswipa nyi chuma nyi chimwe, ka; mba uyilinge mu chikungulwila. Mandumbu ni mapangi eswe ka kukilikita ha keshi ku honga hanji kaleleso mumu wa yena Ndungi wa Kristu. Ayo, kaali ngamba anakilikita hamuwika, ni mu uwika wa Liji. Tuli nyi pwila, tunechi ku lemba chenu mumu wa atu eswe, ni mumu wa yetwe, ni nawa chahiana chinji hali ndumbwetu mulemu Yosefwe Branham ni chisemuko chenyi cheswe.
Kutwala ha milimo ya uwayilo, yili ya kusoneka, ya kulonga mu tungonde kwishi, nyi ngwe hanayilumbununa kulu ndusu lume mu limi lienu. Mba, nyi ku kushi chilumbununyi wa kupachikila ha yisaji (VGR) muchi kilikita chene.

- Nge mutu mwapwa Chinjiho chaYehova, veji kumumbapachisanga mulijina lyaYesu.—Mateu 28:18, 19.
- Tweji kulombanga kuhichila mulijina lyaYesu.—Yowano 15:16.
- Twafwelela ngwetu Yesu apwa Mutwe, chipwe ngwetu ikiye vahana ngolo hali vatu vosena.—Wavaka-Kolinde 1, 11:3.
Kaha nawa kwatwama vyuma vyavivulu twalihandunwinamo navatu veka vaze valivuluka kupwa vaka-Kulishitu. CHIZE MUWANA VERSU JA MU MBIMBILIYA
Mu Mbimbiliya muli mikanda yikehe-yikehe 66. Yili yakuhandununa mu yihanda yaali: Yisoneko ya Hepreu-Arame (“Usendo Ukulu”) ni Yisoneko ya Ngregu (“Usendo Waha”). Tukatining kwichil mem pa mbut ja uyakin tukata kukun. (1Kor 3:6) Anch twatanijan ni muntu umekeshina kusanger, chidi chiwamp kusha chipul cha kwisambin pitukeza kumuchirikin. Chinech chikez kumukwash asangera yom tukeza kwisambin ni kutukwash chakwel twirijeka nawamp mulong wa kumuchirikin. Anch twamuchirikin, tukutwish kumulej anch twez kal mulong wa kwakul ku chipul twashila.
MUTAPU WA KUSADIN:
Piwirijekina mulong wa mudimu wa kulejan wa ku chikumbu ni chikumbu, rijek kand chipul chilondwilaku mulong wa kwakul piukeza kumuchirikin muntu. Chifanyidin kwikal chipul chakwilau mu mukand wamushila. Chikutwish kwikal ap chipul chakwilau pakach pa mikand yetu ya kwilej nich, chiukeza kusadil piukeza kumuchirikin.
Piukupwisha kwisamb ni muntu wasangera, mwijikisha maswir mey ma kwambamb nend kand ni kupwa muleja chipul chilondwilaku chiwarijekang. Anch chiswapel, mwita adres wend ap nimero wend wa telefon.
Anch wamulej anch ukez kumuchirikin pa chisu kanang, ufanyidin kulimish chisu chinicha.—Mat 5:37.

Nyingika chize kukunguluka chetu chapwa. Wana chihela cha kulikungulwila chize chili hakamwihi ni kuze watwama.
Yika Yakulingiwa ha kukunguluka chetu?
Yela ja Yehova kakulikungulula kaali ha poso hanga awayile Zambi. (A-Hepreu 10:24, 25) Ha kukunguluka chacho chize mutu mweswawo mahasa kupwaho, twakulilongesa yize Mbimbiliya yakwamba ni chize mutuhasa kukaula malongeso jamo ku mwono wetu.
Kanji-kanji ha kukunguluka chacho, waze aliho no mahasa kukumbulula, ngwe chizechene chakulingiwa mu yimwe kalasa. Kukunguluka chakuputuka ni mwaso ni kulemba, ni ha kuhwa che chakulingiwa.
Kuwafupiwile kupwa Chela cha Yehova mba upwe ha kukunguluka chetu. Tunanusanyika nulieswe hanga nupwe ha kukunguluka chetu. Kukunguluka chetu chapwa chawana, chikwo nawa keshi kwitaho mbongo.

Ha tangwa 3 lia Dezembro 2022, ndumbu Samuel Campos, wa mu Komite ya Mutango mu Angola, katuhwishile mukanda wa Mateu ni wa Yilinga mu Chokwe ni mu Ibinda. Mikanda yino kayituhwishile ha internet ha chimwe kukunguluka cha kukopa chize atalile kuli atu 2,000.
Lusango wa Yela ja Yehova mu limi lia Chokwe kaputukile ha 2007, muze aputukile chizavu chitangu mu limi lino. Haliapwila, mu Angola muli yikungulwila 10 mu limi lia Chokwe; República Democrática do Congo muli yikungulwila 23.
Umwe wa kuli mandumbu waze akulumbununa mu limi lia Chokwe, yamba ngwenyi: “Tuli ni Mbimbiliya jinji mu Chokwe. Yimwe yapwa yashi, alioze yakuteta-teta manyonga waze te atamba kupwa mu yisoneko. Yikwo kuyishi kuteta manyonga, alioze yakuzachisa maliji akalu. Muze ngunatange Mbimbiliya yino yaha, ngunevu ngwe Yehova kanahanjika pundu ni yami.”
Chikungulwila chitangu mu limi lia Ibinda chaputukile ha 2014. Haliapwila, kuli yikungulwila 13 mu limi lia Ibinda. Shimbu te kanda achituhwisa mukanda wa Mateu ni Yilinga, kukwakapwile Mbimbiliya niyimwe mu limi liacho. Hachino, mandumbu te kakuzachisa Tradução do Novo Mundo mu putu. Umwe ndumbu wa mu chizavu cha kulumbununa mu Ibinda, yamba ngwenyi: “Kuli versu jimwe ya Mbimbiliya jize haliapwila ngunawane kanawa ulumbunwiso. Chili chiwape kulinga chihanda mu chizavu chino. Chino chatakamisa ufulielo wami.”
Tunafuliela ngwetu, mikanda yino yapwa kutuhwisa mu Chokwe ni mu Ibinda muyikwasa mandumbu jetu akundame kuli Yehova.—Tiangu 4:8.

Zango lize Yela ja Yehova akwete hali Zambi ni hali atu, liakwakwasa kwambujola sango ja mu Mbimbiliya kuli atu eswe kuchingako atu waze ambile ngwo “keshi kuzanga kwapanjika.” (Mateu 22:37-39) Zango hali Zambi liakutukwasa kwononokena shimbi ya Mwanenyi ya “kwambujola kanawa kuli atu eswe.” (Yilinga 10:42; 1 Yoano 5:3) Mba tulinge chino, twatamba kwambujola sango jipema yisuho yinji ngwe chize aprofeta alingile ku shakulu. (Jeremia 25:4) Amu twakuzanga akwetu, twakwambulwila “sango ja Wanangana” jize jakulamwina mwono wa atu, kuchingako wa waze akulituna kutupanjika ku uputukilo.—Mateu 24:14.
Kanji-kanji, atu waze keshi kuzanga kutupanjika ku uputukilo, kakuzanga kutupanjika muze twakuhanjika no chisuho chikwo. Tutalenu mumu liaka chino chakulingwa:
Atu kakwaluka.
Atu akwo ku zuwo liacho mahasa kutupanjika.
Atu kakwalumuka. Atu amwe kakunyingika ngwo kanafupiwa Zambi ni kupanjika sango ja mu Mbimbiliya muze yuma yakwalumuka ku mwono wo hanji mumu lia yuma yize yinalingiwa hashi. (Mateu 5:3) Chipwe atu waze akulimika ni yetu, mahasa kwalumuka ngwe chizechene alingile postolo Paulu.—1 Timoteu 1:13.
Kutushi kushinjila atu hanga apanjike sango jipema. (1 Petulu 3:15) Tunanyingika ngwetu, mutu ni mutu katamba kukwata chiyulo chenyi mwene hakutwala ku uwayilo.—Shimbi Yamuchiali 30:19, 20.

akwa-mafwefwe waze akusa yuma yo ene kulutwe kuhiana ya akwo.

“Kanda nufuliela yilolo, hanji umwe mwana mutu yoze keshi kuhasa kukwasa.”—Samu 146:3.
Mutu yoze muhasa kujikijila
Mbimbiliya yakuhanjika hali mutu yoze muhasa kujikijila: Yesu Kristu. Iye keshi wika mutu mupema yoze watwamine hano hashi. Zambi katongwele Yesu hanga ‘akayule ngwe Mwanangana . . . , nawa Wanangana wenyi kuuchi kahwa.’ (Luka 1:32, 33) Yesu kali Mwanangana mu Wanangana wa Zambi, unguvulu uze unayulu haliapwila mu malilu.—Mateu 6:10.
Mba unyingike mumu liaka watamba kujikijila muli Yesu, tanga chikuma “Iya Mwanangana mu Wanangana wa Zambi?” ni chikuma “Yika Wanangana wa Zambi Muukalinga?”

Cizombi nyi kaxinakaji
O caçador e o velho
“Cizombi” yaya nyi kuzomba tuxitu mu musenge, yenda thungu yinene nyi umwe kaxitu kamumwene; muhasulaho yaxaha “mukhondo”, hanga akamuzuwe kupu, ximbu lyolyene yamona mwixi unafindagana, mwaku ndamako yawana mukhanda, mwanonokamo yamonamo“Kaxinakaji”una phephela yifo ya tuxitu akuxaha. Muze cizombi hamukundama, yamutambwokesa, muhasulaho ngwenyi yikha weza nyi kulyinga kuwambika wami? Vula te kanawayangila; ngwenyi njila mucima.
Kaxinakaji muze vula hapatuka kuwayangila, yamutuma kuya nyi kutaha meya kukalwiji, akutelekela. Yiye kakolemene; mwanda uta nyi kaxitu kenyi yahicika, mba yaya nyi kutaha meya, kaxinakaji yanda mukhondo yamupapa hakahya. Cizombi kacimbwile kwiza nyi meya, mwaheta yawana yuma ahicikanga hayipapa, mwayitala nyi cimwe kacambile kwenyi.
Kaxinakaji, yahula cizombi mathangwa amwe hacihunda athu kakwamba ngwo khala, khala; cilumbu cakha? Ngwenyi: - cakupwa ngwe cize ngunamono! Mwaximbula yamutuma nawa nyi kuca khunyi, yaneha khunyi kalyivumine. Yamuhula nawa; cingoloxi nakwiva athu mamba: hehye-wo, hehye-wo, hacilumbu cakha? Ngwenyi: hayeswe yize ngunamono. Yamutuma kuhika jima; mwamanyisa kuhika, yalya hamuwikha. Muze hamana kulya; Cizombi ngwenyi ngunayi kwami.
Kaxinakaji, yalongeza mitonga ya yifo yaalyi, yamwaha. Hacilumbu cakupwa mbovu. Twanuke amusono kexi ngwe waze ahaximbu ya tulamba. “Cino cixima; cakulongesela twanuke nyi makulwana”.
Ululyi: Makulwana ngwo; wazeya walya yinji.

Yize Chisoneko Chino Chinalumbunuka:
Yetu mutuhasa wika kukumba kole ni ukwaso wa Zambi. Spiritu yisandu muyihasa kutukwasa kupwa ni yitanga yize kutuchi kuhasa kupwa nayo ku tachi ja yetwene. Kashika shimbu tweseke kukumba kole ku tachi ja yetwene, muchipema chinji nyi mutwita ukwaso wa Zambi. Nyi twalinga chino mutupwa ni shindakenyo ngwe yize apwile nayo postolo Paulu yoze wasonekene ngwenyi: “Kunahasa kulinga yuma yeswe muli yoze wakunguhashisa.” (A-Fwilipu 4:13) Chikwo nawa mutuhasa kwamba ngwetu: “Kakungukwasa kuli Yehova.”—Samu 121:2.
Yize Muhasa Kulinga:
“Yehova hanalumuna ndako jami, napwile chitenu musono hinapwa mutu wa sambukila.”—WALDO
Lemba kuli Yehova ni kumwita ni mbunge yeswe hanga akwehe spiritu yenyi yisandu. (Luka 11:13) Mwite hanga akukwase kupwa ni yitanga yipema. Lilongese yize Mbimbiliya yinambe hakutwala ku yitanga yize muyikukwasa kwehuka kole, ngwe zango, sambukila, uhomboloji ni uhumikizo. Fupa jila yakupwilamo ni yitanga yino ku mwono we. Likate ni atu waze anase tachi hanga apwe ni yitanga yino. Atu jacho mahasa kukukwasa “kulikasumuna ku zango ni yitanga yipema.” —A-Hepreu 10:24.

Liuka lyaVinjiho jaYehova lyaputukile kusongo yalikulukaji lyamyaka lyakusokesa 19. Halwola kana lizavu lyalindende lyavaka-kulinangula Mbimbiliya lyapwile kwakamwihi naPittsburgh, Pennsylvania, muUnited States, lyaputukile kukekesa vyuma yanangula Mbimbiliya. Vaputukile kukekesa vyuma vanangwilenga mujichachi navyuma yanangula chikupu Mbimbiliya. Vyuma vahehwojwele vavisonekele mumikanda nakuvipangila kuvatu, vyeka vyalovokele mumapapilo amijimbu namumikanda tunakuvuluka oholyapwa ngwetu Kaposhi Kakutalila Ali Nakuvilika Wangana waYehova.
Hali eli lizavu lyavaka-kulinangula Mbimbiliya hapwile nalunga umwe walijina lyaCharles Taze Russell. Ou lunga ikiye atwaminyinyine mulimo wakunangula Mbimbiliya nakusoneka Kaposhi Kakutalila, oloze keshi ikiye aputukile liukako. Russell navaze vakwavo vaka-kulinangula Mbimbiliya vafwililile kukundwiza kunangula chaYesu Kulishitu nakukavangiza vyuma vanangwilenga vaka-Kulishitu muchikungulwilo chamulikulukaji lyakulivanga. Hakuwana nge Yesu ikiye aputukile chikungulwilo chavaka-Kulishitu, ngocho twamumona kupwa ikiye aputukile liuka lyetu.—Wavaka-Kolose 1:18-20.
